markdown:
These towering heaps of earth can inflict tremendous damage up close and from afar. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Stone Mauler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2979) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 142 1.1 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 80 feet **Languages** [Petran](/Languages.aspx?ID=109) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12 **Str** +6 **Dex** -1 **Con** +7 **Int** -1 **Wis** +3 **Cha** -1 **Earthbound** When not touching solid ground, a stone mauler is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions. --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +23 **Ref** +15 **Will** +19 **HP** 180 **Immunities** bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Spike Stones** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=585), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) 5 feet. Spikes of rock rise up from all stone surfaces in the emanation, creating [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). A creature moving in the terrain takes 2d6 piercing damage for each square of spikes it moves into (a Large or larger creature takes damage only once for each square it moves, even if its space covers multiple squares of spikes). Creatures with the [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=585) trait ignore all effects within the area. The stone mauler can disable or activate this aura using a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) trait.
**Crumble** Trigger The elemental takes damage from a hostile source while atop rock or earth; Effect The elemental crumbles into the ground, [Burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310)down 15 feet. This Burrowing does not trigger reactions. The elemental can't Crumble again for 1d4 rounds --- **Speed** 35 feet, burrow 35 feet; earth glide **Melee** fist +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+10 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=47) 10 feet **Ranged** rock +21 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d12+6 bludgeoning **Earth Glide** The elemental can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310) through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the elemental moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.
name: Stone Mauler

summary_markdown: These towering heaps of earth can inflict tremendous damage up close and from afar.
text: Stone Mauler These towering heaps of earth can inflict tremendous damage up close and from afar. Recall Knowledge - Elemental (Arcana, Nature): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Stone Mauler Source Monster Core pg. 142 1.1 Perception +16; darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 80 feet Languages Petran Skills Athletics +21, Stealth +12 Str +6 Dex -1 Con +7 Int -1 Wis +3 Cha -1 Earthbound When not touching solid ground, a stone mauler is slowed 1 and can't use reactions. --- AC 27 Fort +23 Ref +15 Will +19 HP 180 Immunities bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep Spike Stones (aura, earth, primal) 5 feet. Spikes of rock rise up from all stone surfaces in the emanation, creating difficult terrain. A creature moving in the terrain takes 2d6 piercing damage for each square of spikes it moves into (a Large or larger creature takes damage only once for each square it moves, even if its space covers multiple squares of spikes). Creatures with the earth trait ignore all effects within the area. The stone mauler can disable or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. Crumble Reaction Trigger The elemental takes damage from a hostile source while atop rock or earth; Effect The elemental crumbles into the ground, Burrowingdown 15 feet. This Burrowing does not trigger reactions. The elemental can't Crumble again for 1d4 rounds --- Speed 35 feet, burrow 35 feet; earth glide Melee Single Action fist +21 (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet Ranged Single Action rock +21 (Brutal, range increment 80 feet), Damage 2d12+6 bludgeoning Earth Glide The elemental can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the elemental moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.
